original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo sambādhe lomaṁ saṁharāpetvā aciravatiyā nadiyā vesiyāhi saddhiṁ naggā ekatitthe nahāyanti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ sambādhe lomam saharāpetvā aciravatiyāḥ nadiyāḥ vesiyāhi saddhim naggāḥ ekatitthe nahāyanti

original: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo sambādhe lomaṁ saṁharāpessanti, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo”ti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhuniyaḥ sambādhe lomam saharāpessanti seyyathā api gihiniyaḥ kāmabhoginiyaḥ ti

original: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhuniyo tāsaṁ vesiyānaṁ ujjhāyantīnaṁ khiyyantīnaṁ vipācentīnaṁ.
analyzed: assosum kho bhikkhuniyaḥ tāsam vesiyānam ujjhāyantīnam khiyyantīnam vipācentīnam

original: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: yāḥ tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ appicchāḥ pe tāḥ ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo sambādhe lomaṁ saṁharāpessantī”ti …pe…
analyzed: katham hi nāma chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ sambādhe lomam saharāpessanti iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo sambādhe lomaṁ saṁharāpentī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira bhikkhave chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ sambādhe lomam saharāpenti iti

original: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo sambādhe lomaṁ saṁharāpessanti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhave chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ sambādhe lomam saharāpessanti
na ita bhikkhave appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ imam sikkhāpadam uddisantu

original: “Yā pana bhikkhunī sambādhe lomaṁ saṁharāpeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī sambādhe lomam saharāpeyya pācittiyanti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetā bhikkhunī iti
ekam pi lomam saharāpeti āpatti pācittiyassa
